column4: ok, following the sound troubleshooting instructions, I typed in 'modprobe snd-sb16', and it seemed to work, but when I try to run alsamixer, it says "alsamixer: function snd_ctl_open failed for default: No such device".
this is just a shot in the dark, but have you checked to see that the card was seated properly in the socket?
sometimes you gotta make sure there is gas in the tank before you pull your arm out of socket yanking the cord
it works properly when I boot into a different OS
